Title: Rome
Writer: Bruno Heller, William J. MacDonald, John Milius
Actors: Kevin McKidd, Ray Stevenson, Polly Walker, Kerry Condon
Plot: A down-to-earth account of the lives of both illustrious and ordinary Romans set in the last days of the Roman Republic.
Awards: Nominated for 2 Golden Globes. Another 14 wins & 26 nominations.
